TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 控制当属性目标由 序列化时生成的 XML 架构。

span.span: Controls the XML schema that is generated when the attribute target is serialized by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属于一系列属性，用于控制如何序列化或反序列化对象。The belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object. 有关类似属性的完整列表，请参阅[Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control XML Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-xml-serialization.md). 您可以将应用类、 结构、 枚举或接口声明。You can apply the to a class, structure, enumeration, or interface declaration. 将应用于类，以指定的 XML 类型命名空间、 XML 类型名称，以及是否包括 XML 架构文档中的类型。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看设置的属性的结果类，编译应用程序作为可执行文件或 DLL，并将传递到生成的文件[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 该工具将写入架构，包括类型定义。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. > [!NOTE] > 如果您设置属性设置为`false`，则[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)不包括在架构中的类型。If you set the property to `false`, the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) does not include the type in the schema. 默认情况下，为每个公共类生成 XSD 工具`complexType`和该类型的元素。By default, for each public class, the XSD tool generates a `complexType` and an element of that type. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 可以使用单词`XmlType`而不是较长在代码中。You can use the word `XmlType` in your code instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例演示两个类到已应用。The following example shows two classes to which the has been applied. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个实例用于重写的两个类序列化的类。The following example creates two instances of the class that are used to override the serialization of the two classes. [!code-cpp[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/CPP/xmltypeattribute1_2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/CS/xmltypeattribute1_2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/VB/xmltypeattribute1_2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string typeName) cil managed

param.name: typeName
param.span: 序列化类实例时生成（和在反序列化类实例时识别）的 XML 类型的名称。

span.span: The name of the XML type that the generates when it serializes the class instance (and recognizes when it deserializes the class instance).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并指定 XML 类型的名称。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name of the XML type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将应用于类，以指定的 XML 类型命名空间、 XML 类型名称，以及是否包括 XML 架构文档中的类型。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看设置的属性的结果类，编译应用程序作为可执行文件或 DLL，并将传递到生成的文件[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 该工具将写入架构，包括类型定义。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个实例用于重写的两个类序列化的类。The following example creates two instances of the class that are used to override the serialization of the two classes. [!code-cpp[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/CPP/xmltypeattribute1_2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/CS/xmltypeattribute1_2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XMLTypeAttribute1_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XMLTypeAttribute1_2/VB/xmltypeattribute1_2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将应用于类，以指定的 XML 类型命名空间、 XML 类型名称，以及是否包括 XML 架构文档中的类型。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看的属性设置结果类，编译应用程序作为可执行文件或 DLL，并将生成的文件传递到 XML 架构定义工具 (XSD.exe)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the XML Schema Definition tool (XSD.exe). 该工具将写入架构，包括类型定义。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. ## Examples 下面的示例应用到`ExtraneousInfo`类，设置属性设置为`false`。The following example applies the to the `ExtraneousInfo` class, setting the property to `false`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.IncludeInSchema Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML type.
The name of the XML type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将应用于类，以指定的 XML 类型命名空间、 XML 类型名称，以及是否包括 XML 架构文档中的类型。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看设置的属性的结果类，编译应用程序作为可执行文件或 DLL，并将传递到生成的文件[XML 架构定义工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 该工具将写入架构，包括类型定义。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. ## Examples 下面的示例应用到`Person`和`Job`类。The following example applies the to the `Person` and `Job` classes. 如果编译类并将生成可执行文件传递到 XML 架构定义工具，在输出部分中显示的架构。If you compile the class and pass the resulting executable file to the XML Schema Definition tool, the schema is displayed in the Output section. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlTypeAttribute.TypeName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
